sections.value_proposition: Universal adaptability, modular architecture, AI-agnostic integration, and self-evolving design.
sections.system_overview: A layered framework transforming raw data into commercial blueprints with metadata and validation.
sections.quick_start_guide: 1) Place raw files into /framework  2) Run the pipeline  3) Review JSON in /blueprints  4) Deploy to your ecosystem.
sections.template_instructions: Follow the schema. Keep sections concise. Use neutral, professional English. Avoid personal names.
sections.examples: Education curricula, healthcare protocols, financial decision flows, brand guidelines.
sections.license_and_notes: Licensed under NamoVerse Creative Framework License (NCFL-1.0). Provide attribution for redistribution.
sections.marketing_pack: Target: builders, strategists, educators. Pain: unstructured data. USP: chaos-to-commerce via meta-intelligence. Pricing: Base/Pro tiers. GTM: ProductHunt + LinkedIn.
